channel.title: HELP! Drop Rates!
channel.description: Ok so on my server, I have it so that the corporal beast drops sigils, elixers, and a spirit shield. For some reason, they are very common, even though their drop rate is %1. I was thinking that maybe they're dropped more often because the beast has a possibilty of dropping many items. So, is there any way to fix this? Here's the code: [code] //Corporal Beast npcdrop = 2705 536 1 100 npcdrop = 2705 18095 1 1 npcdrop = 2705 18090 1 1 npcdrop = 2705 18091 1 1 npcdrop = 2705 18092 1 1 npcdrop = 2705 18093 1 1 npcdrop = 2705 16003 1 1 npcdrop = 2705 10039 1 5 npcdrop = 2705 10008 1 4 npcdrop = 2705 10054 1 4 npcdrop = 2705 15070 13 25 npcdrop = 2705 15079 13 25 npcdrop = 2705 15069 13 25 npcdrop = 2705 15071 13 25 [/code] It drops: Bones, Elixers, 4 Sigils, a Spirit Shield, 4 different kind of summoning charms, and 3 different kind of pouches.

item.title: HELP! Drop Rates!
item.dc:creator: @hitman2009 hitman2009
item.description:
@hitman2009 wrote:

Ok so on my server, I have it so that the corporal beast drops sigils, elixers, and a spirit shield.
For some reason, they are very common, even though their drop rate is %1. I was thinking that maybe they’re dropped more often because the beast has a possibilty of dropping many items. So, is there any way to fix this? Here’s the code:

//Corporal Beast
npcdrop = 2705	536	1	100
npcdrop = 2705	18095	1	1
npcdrop = 2705	18090	1	1
npcdrop = 2705	18091	1	1
npcdrop = 2705	18092	1	1
npcdrop = 2705	18093	1	1
npcdrop = 2705	16003	1	1
npcdrop = 2705	10039	1	5
npcdrop = 2705	10008	1	4
npcdrop = 2705	10054	1	4
npcdrop = 2705	15070	13	25
npcdrop = 2705	15079	13	25
npcdrop = 2705	15069	13	25
npcdrop = 2705	15071	13	25

It drops:
Bones, Elixers, 4 Sigils, a Spirit Shield, 4 different kind of summoning charms, and 3 different kind of pouches.

Read full topic
